result.execSummary:
The deferred prosecution or sentencing agreement(s) on this case were fulfilled, and the charge(s) were dismissed.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt: Voucher to DOA for Polk Co Treas to pay $1747.61 Ct App'ted atty fees for 15CF47, 15CF59, 15CF177.  Def assessed, added to PP and copies mailed.

CASES: 15CF47 & 15CF59. Defendant John R Costanzo in court with attorney Mark Drew Biller.  Daniel Joseph Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 10:32 am.
15CF47-Count 1-Guilty.  CT-accept plea, adj guilty & judgment entered.  Count 2-dismissed.
15CF59-Count 1-No Contest.  CT-accept plea, adj guilty but do NOT enter judgment - DJOC agreement-5 yr agreement.

SENTENCING (15CF47)-  No firearms, cannot vote until civil rights restored, cannot hold elected office, other civil rights may be lost until restored, no body armor, if not US citizen face deportation or loss of other citizenship rights.
w/h sentence, probation up to 2 yrs, if probation feels appropr - may petition for early discharge.  $290.60.  Must provide DNA sample, $250 surcharge.  120 days CT, banked for use by probation, subj to WR, no GT.  Must report to Probation today.  AODA & comply w/ recommendations.  Follow rules of supervision.  No drugs/paraph.  PCR.  11:10 am adj.

CASES: 15CF47 & 15CF59. Defendant John R Costanzo in court with attorney Mark Drew Biller.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 9:17 am.  JA to set 15CF47 for JT.  Bonds cont.  9:21 am adj  Review hearing scheduled for January 27, 2016 at 08:30 am.

CASES:  15CF47, 15CF59.  Defendant John R Costanzo in court with attorney Mark Drew Biller.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  BJM-clerk 9:20 am  No resolution.  Bonds cont. 9:22 am adj.
for continuance filed by Atty Biller

CASES: 15CF177, 15CF47 & 15CF59. Defendant John R Costanzo in court with attorney Mark Drew Biller.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 10:13 am.  
15CF47-Biller-NG plea, WST.  15CF59-NG plea, WST.  15CF177-ADA-motion to dismiss.  CT-dismissed w/ prej.  JA to to set 15CF47 for JT w/ analyst & PTC on both files.  Motion due 1 wk prior to PTC.  Bonds cont.  10:16 am adj.

CASES: 15CF47, 15CF59 & 15CF177.  Not to have contact with: Mark Nelson except as necessary thru court proceedings.  Not to possess or use drugs or drug paraphernalia.  Subject to testing to determine compliance upon reasonable suspicion.

CASES: 15CF47, 15CF59 & 15CF177. Defendant John R Costanzo in court with attorney Mark Drew Biller.  Defendant John R Costanzo in custody.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 9:18 am.  Biller-waiver of PH on all 3 files.  ADA-ask to amend to signature bond.  CT grants waiver of PH as to all 3 cases.  
15CF59-CT finds PC, def bound over.  15CF177-CT finds PC, def bound over.  15CF47-CT finds PC, def bound over.  CT sets new bond to cover all files.  Bond cont as modified.  9:40 AM ADJ.  Arraignment scheduled for May 26, 2015 at 10:00 am.

CASES: 15CF177, 15CF59 & 15CF47.  Defendant John R Costanzo in court with attorney Shelly Tomtschik.  Defendant John R Costanzo in custody.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 1:10 pm.  STom-previous files under ct appt'd counsel Biller.  15CF177-CT sets bond.  Atty Biller now present 1:16 pm.  Bonds cont.  1:27 pm adj.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 30, 2015 at 09:00 am.
plea of Not Guilty and Defense Motions.  Submitted by Atty Biller.

CASES: 15CF47 & 15CF59. Defendant John R Costanzo in court with attorney Mark Drew Biller.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 11:09 am.  
Atty Biller unaware of 15CF59, ask to reschedule.  JA to set both cases for PH w/ counsel/investigator.  Bonds cont. 11:15 am adj.

Not to have contact with:  Mark J. Nelson except if necessary thru court proceedings.  Not to possess or use drugs or drug paraphernalia.  Subject to testing to determine compliance upon reasonable suspicion.

CASES:  15CF59 & 15CF47.  Defendant John R Costanzo in court.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  BJM-clerk 2:38 pm  CT appts Atty Biller as counsel at $25.00 e/m to be added to existing PP.  CT sets bond as to both cases.  WSPH.  JA to sched PH w/Atty Biller.  2:47 pm  adj.
